Name: Chemistry of Atmospheres: An Introduction to the Chemistry of the Atmospheres of Earth, the Planets, and their Satellites

ReviewList.Text: Such a great text. This book gives you the basics and more. I'd highly recommend it to Graduate students in this field of science.
Even thought this book is out of date, it contains an immense amount of important information and is still relevant.

I read this book as part of a class I took on environmental chemistry.  It is thorough and extensive in the subject matter it covers, and was not too difficult to read.  Alas, I find the subject matter boring before reading this book, and left with my opinions unchanged.
